about_the_game:
HUMANKIND™ - Music for the Ages, Vol. VIII features hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. Volume 8 includes the 28 new tracks from the DLC “Cultures of Oceania”, performed by Jean-Noël Godard and Lionel Schulze. Produced by Arnaud Roy.

[This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game]
28 tracks. 33 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
detailed_description:
HUMANKIND™ - Music for the Ages, Vol. VIII features hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. Volume 8 includes the 28 new tracks from the DLC “Cultures of Oceania”, performed by Jean-Noël Godard and Lionel Schulze. Produced by Arnaud Roy.

[This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game]
28 tracks. 33 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
